comment.text: Button text is used as a label for a button in the Portal Settings page, likely within a settings dialog or configuration panel. The translation of this key will be displayed on the button's surface, allowing users to customize its text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "زر كتابة" (zar kitaaba) literally translates to "writing button" rather than "button text". While understandable, it's not the most accurate or natural translation for "button text".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: نص الزر (nass az-zar) - This translates to "button text" and is a more accurate rendering.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao word 'ປຸ່ມ' (pùm) is correctly spelled, but it might be more natural to use a more descriptive term for 'Button' depending on context, such as 'ກຸ່ມປຸ່ມ' (gùm pùm) for 'button group'. However, 'ປຸ່ມ' is acceptable in this case.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ກຸ່ມປຸ່ມ' if the context requires a more descriptive term for 'Button'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao word 'ຂໍ້ຄວາມ' (khôo kwaam) is correctly spelled, meaning 'text'.
The Dutch translation 'Knop tek' is an incomplete and inaccurate translation of 'Button text'. 'Tek' means 'text' but 'Knop' just means 'button'. It misses the 'text' aspect of the original phrase.

The translation "Botão de texto" is a literal translation of "Button text" but doesn't convey the intended meaning in Portuguese. "Button text" refers to the text displayed on a button. A more accurate translation would depend on the context, but possibilities include "Texto do botão", "Rótulo do botão", or simply "Texto do botão" if clarity is paramount.

The translation "Botão de texto" is a literal translation of "Button text" and doesn't convey the intended meaning in Portuguese. It translates to "Text Button," which is not a common or natural phrasing. A better translation would depend on the context of the button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Texto do botão" (Button text), "Rótulo do botão" (Button label), or a more context-specific translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "බොත්තමේ පෙළ" is understandable, it's a literal translation ("text of the button"). A more natural and idiomatic translation for "Button text" would be something like "බට්න් පෙළ" (Button Pela).
The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation 'Текст дугмета' is spelled correctly.
The translation 'Chữ cho nút' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Button text'. 'Cho' implies 'for', which isn't quite the meaning intended.
